description: UCO’s new Sprout + Mini Lantern is a rechargeable version of the popular Sprout lantern, an ultra-compact and versatile camp, and a tent lighting option. The easy-to-use push-button control allows you to quickly dim or boost your light (up to 100 lumens), or switch to a soothing blue Moonlight Mode. The patented MAGNA-LOOP magnetic lanyard hanging system easily elevates the light to a tent or tree or allows you to place it on the table for traditional use. Powered by an included lithium rechargeable battery pack or three AAA batteries (not included). The Sprout+ Mini Lantern is a compact light that packs a punch and can light up your tent or campsite.
name: Sprout + Mini LED Lantern - Rechargeable

specs.value: LI-ION Rechargeable (included) or 3 x AAA (not included)
